verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will be yours, you will be mine
Together in eternity
Our hearts of love will be entwined
Together in eternity
Forever in eternity

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will be yours, you will be mine
Together in eternity
Our hearts of love will be entwined
Together in eternity
Forever in eternity

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
No more tears of pain in our eyes
No more fear or shame
For we will be with you
Yes, we will be with you
